item.title: 澳大利亚失业率保持低位，招聘人数持续增加
item.description: 澳大利亚 12 月份的失业率保持在较低水平，经济延续了连续招聘增长的势头，凸显了劳动力市场对高利率的不同寻常的适应力。【原文：Australia’s unemployment rate remained low in December as the economy extended a streak of hiring gains, underlining the labor market’s unusual resilience to elevated interest rates.】

item.title: 环球音乐计划出售美国股票换取潘兴广场股份
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group NV）已同意计划在 9 月 15 日前出售美国股票，以履行与亿万富翁比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）旗下对冲基金潘兴广场（Pershing Square）达成的协议。【原文：Universal Music Group NV has agreed to plan a US share sale by Sept. 15, in order to fulfill an agreement with billionaire Bill Ackman’s hedge fund Pershing Square.】

item.title: 比特币突破 100,000 美元关口，对美联储政策路径的忧虑有所缓解
item.description: 比特币创下新年最大涨幅，因为令人欣慰的美国通胀数据重燃了对美联储进一步降息的押注，从而提振了全球市场。【原文：Bitcoin notched its biggest gain of the new year as reassuring US inflation figures revived bets on further interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve, lifting global markets.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据提振降息乐观情绪，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 在美国通胀率意外放缓使美联储今年降息的预期升温之后，黄金保持了连续两天的上涨势头。【原文：Gold held a two-day advance, after a surprise slowdown in US inflation revived expectations for Federal Reserve rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 印尼意外降息加剧债券市场不确定性
item.description: 印尼央行本周降息打破了几乎整个市场的预期，加深了政府债券收益率的不确定性。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank defied the expectations of practically the entire market when it cut interest rates this week, deepening a period of uncertainty for government bond yields.】

item.title: 随着欧洲痛苦的缓解，德国的困境水平将上升
item.description: 德国正在成为欧洲企业困境的异类，因为其出口驱动型经济正在与全球需求疲软和持续的价格压力作斗争。【原文：Germany is becoming an outlier for corporate distress in Europe as its export-driven economy battles against faltering global demand and persistent price pressures.】

item.title: 手机初创公司 Nothing 获得融资，终身销售额突破 10 亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由谷歌风险投资部门和 iPod 创造者托尼-法德尔（Tony Fadell）支持的智能手机制造商 Nothing 正在寻求筹集至少 1 亿美元的资金，以扩大其业务。【原文：Nothing, a smartphone maker backed by Google’s venture arm and iPod creator Tony Fadell, is seeking to raise at least $100 million in funding to expand its operations, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特斯拉的亚洲竞争对手在印度新兴电动汽车市场中拔得头筹
item.description: 铃木汽车公司印度分公司、比亚迪股份有限公司和 VinFast Auto Ltd.等汽车制造商正准备在新德里展示其新型电动汽车，因为对这个增长最快的主要汽车市场的争夺愈演愈烈，而特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Suzuki Motor Corp.’s India unit, BYD Co. and VinFast Auto Ltd. are among carmakers gearing to showcase their new electric vehicles in New Delhi as the fight intensifies for the fastest-growing major automobile market where Tesla Inc. is conspicuous by its absence.】

item.title: 国际能源署（IEA）警告俄罗斯采取限制措施，石油库存减少，石油涨势扩大
item.description: 由于全球供应风险不断增加，以及美国商业原油库存创下 2021 年以来最长的连续降幅，石油延续了年初的强劲升势。【原文：Oil extended a powerful early-year advance on mounting risks to global supplies, and as commercial crude inventories in the US posted their longest run of declines since 2021.】

item.title: Blackstone 寻求以 30 亿美元出售鲍勃-迪伦、阿黛尔歌曲版权
item.description: 知情人士称，Blackstone Inc. 已聘请财务顾问探讨歌曲版权的出售事宜，其中包括鲍勃-迪伦 (Bob Dylan)、阿黛尔 (Adele) 和阿丽亚娜-格兰德 (Ariana Grande) 的音乐作品，该公司预计这些作品的售价将达到或超过 30 亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has hired financial advisers to explore the sale of song rights, including music from Bob Dylan, Adele and Ariana Grande, that it expects to fetch $3 billion or more, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 印度炙手可热的初创企业的衰落正在消灭美国的债务人
item.description: 在华尔街，这是个很容易出售的项目：它是印度历史上最有价值的初创公司，是一家在硅谷享有盛誉的科技公司，它的创始人魅力非凡，并憧憬着主宰在线教育行业，这似乎必将成为 "大流行 "后的下一个风口。【原文：On Wall Street, it was an easy sell: The most valuable startup in India’s history, a tech company with Silicon Valley cachet, a charismatic founder and visions of dominating the online-education business that seemed sure to be one of the post-pandemic’s next big things.】

item.title: 美国通胀后亚洲股市有望上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在新数据显示美国核心通胀率降温，使美联储今年降息的前景依然存在之后，亚洲股市将跟随华尔街走高。【原文：Shares in Asia were set to follow Wall Street higher after new data showed core inflation cooling in the US, keeping alive the prospect of Federal Reserve rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 如果特朗普先下手为强，加拿大准备对 1050 亿美元美国产品加征关税
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大已经拟定了一份初步清单，列出了如果当选总统唐纳德-特朗普决定对加拿大商品征收关税，加拿大将征收关税的1500亿加元（1050亿美元）美国制造商品。【原文：Canada has drawn up an initial list of C$150 billion ($105 billion) of US-manufactured items that it would hit with tariffs if President-elect Donald Trump decides to levy tariffs against Canadian goods, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 漫画蓬勃发展，Webtoon 投资日本网络漫画工作室 No.
item.description: 作为网络漫画公司全球扩张战略的一部分，Webtoon Entertainment Inc.【原文：Webtoon Entertainment Inc. is investing in a Japanese webcomic and manga studio as part of the online comic company’s global expansion strategy.】

item.title: 中国正面临自 20 世纪 60 年代毛泽东时代以来最长的通货紧缩期
item.description: 分析人士说，中国未能打破通货紧缩周期，目前正步入自 20 世纪 60 年代以来最长的整体经济价格连续下跌期，这暴露了一个很可能被去年年底的增长上扬所掩盖的关键弱点。【原文：China has failed to break a deflationary cycle and is now on track for the longest streak of economy-wide price declines since the 1960s, analysts say, exposing a key vulnerability likely masked by a growth upswing at the end of last year.】

item.title: 芝加哥寻求授权出售高达 8.3 亿美元的债券
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）希望出售多达 8.3 亿美元的一般义务债券，在 S&P 全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）下调该市信用评级一天后，他提交了一份批准借款的法令。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson wants to sell as much as $830 million in general obligation bonds, filing an ordinance to approve the borrowing one day after S&P Global Ratings cut the city’s credit rating.】

item.title: 空头兴登堡研究公司创始人表示将解散
item.description: 内特-安德森（Nate Anderson）已决定解散做空机构兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research），该公司创始人周三在一份声明中表示。【原文：Nate Anderson has decided to disband short seller Hindenburg Research, the founder said in a statement Wednesday.】

item.title: 力拓第四季度铁矿石发货量下滑 1
item.description: 世界头号铁矿石出口商力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）报告称，第四季度炼钢材料的出货量同比下滑了 1%，原因是在经济放缓和持续的房地产危机中，中国的需求依然乏力。【原文：Rio Tinto Group, the world’s top iron ore exporter, reported shipments of the steelmaking material slipped 1% in the fourth quarter from the year before, as demand from China remained lackluster amid an economic slowdown and ongoing property crisis.】

item.title: 加拿大被乳制品出口竞争对手指控倾销牛奶产品
item.description: 新西兰、澳大利亚和美国的乳制品公司指责加拿大向世界市场倾销低价牛奶产品，并要求本国政府进行干预。【原文：New Zealand, Australian and US dairy companies are accusing Canada of dumping low-priced milk products on world markets and have asking their governments to intervene.】

item.title: 浆果种植公司 Agrovision 考虑最快于 6 月上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，专门生产浆果的农业公司 Agrovision 公司正在考虑最快于 6 月份进行首次公开募股。【原文：Agrovision Corp., an agriculture company specializing in berries, is considering an initial public offering for as soon as June, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 苹果公司蒂姆-库克计划与科技界首席执行官一起出席特朗普就职典礼
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）计划参加下周举行的当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的就职典礼，这是硅谷领导人前往华盛顿参加就职典礼的最新一批人。【原文：Apple Inc. CEO Tim Cook is planning to attend the inauguration of President-elect Donald Trump next week, the latest in a wave of Silicon Valley leaders traveling to Washington for the ceremony.】

item.title: 腾讯入股天舞-派拉蒙交易引立法者质疑
item.description: 美国国会一位重要议员表示，哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS）所有者派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）与影视制作公司天舞传媒（Skydance Media）的合并案应由联邦当局进行审查，因为中国腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd.）的参与最近被列入了美国军方黑名单。【原文：CBS owner Paramount Global’s merger with film and TV producer Skydance Media should be reviewed by federal authorities because of the participation of China’s Tencent Holdings Ltd., which was recently added to a US military blacklist, a key member of Congress said.】

item.title: 2025 年股票回报将因通胀而增减
item.description: 最近，市场上出现了一个主题，即股票以债券为榜样。通常，推动股价的是经济前景，因此也是盈利。然而，随着又一个季度财报季的到来，即使是在谈论股票时，也是债券市场主导着话题。【原文：A theme has taken hold in markets lately, with stocks taking their cue from bonds. Usually, it’s the outlook for the economy and, therefore, earnings that drive stock prices. Yet, as we begin another quarterly earnings season, it’s the bond market dominating the conversation, even when talking about stocks.】

item.title: 花旗银行的 Banamex 首次公开募股可能延续到 2026 年
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）的高管称，该公司将其墨西哥零售银行业务上市的努力可能会延续到 2026 年，因为该公司将在坎坷的市场、监管审批和寻求关键投资者加入的过程中艰难前行。【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s effort to list its Mexican retail banking operations may stretch into 2026 as it navigates a rocky market, regulatory approvals and seeks to bring key investors on board, according to its top executives.】

item.title: 加拿大希望七国集团就金属定价举行会谈以抵制中国的摇摆
item.description: 加拿大希望其盟国探讨关键矿物的定价下限，以解决其所认为的来自中国的市场干扰，中国是能源转型关键金属的主要供应国。【原文：Canada wants its allies to explore a pricing floor for critical minerals to address what it views as market interference from China, the dominant supplier of metals key to the energy transition.】

item.title: 石油资源丰富的加蓬任命新经济部长解决债务问题
item.description: 加蓬军方领导人布莱斯-奥利吉-恩圭马（Brice Oligui Nguema）已挑选了一位新的经济部长，以解决这个中非产油国的债务问题。【原文：Gabon’s military leader, Brice Oligui Nguema, has picked a new economy minister to resolve the central African oil producer’s debt woes.】

item.title: 美联储《米色报告》指出年底经济将略有温和增长
item.description: 美联储在其《米色手册》（Beige Book）地区商业联系人调查报告中称，在强劲的假日销售支撑下，11 月底和 12 月全美经济活动 "小幅至适度 "增长。【原文：Economic activity increased “slightly to moderately” across the US in late November and December, supported by strong holiday sales, the Federal Reserve said in its Beige Book survey of regional business contacts.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Polar Asset 在取得 2020 年以来最佳回报后壮大团队
item.description: 加拿大最大的对冲基金之一极地资产管理合伙公司（Polar Asset Management Partners）正在加紧实施扩张计划，包括开设伦敦办事处，以及自去年年初以来将员工人数增加 15%。【原文：Polar Asset Management Partners, one of Canada’s largest hedge funds, is pressing ahead with an expansion plan that included opening a London office and growing headcount by 15% since the start of last year.】

item.title: 智利官员称养老金改革部分内容已达成协议
item.description: 智利劳工部长珍妮特-贾拉（Jeannette Jara）表示，政府与反对党就期待已久的养老金改革的一些要点达成了协议，这将增加支撑智利资本市场的储蓄。【原文：Chile Labor Minister Jeannette Jara said the government reached a deal with the opposition on some points for a long-awaited pension reform that would boost savings underpinning the nation’s capital markets.】

item.title: 能源交易商摩科瑞第三年盈利超过 20 亿美元
item.description: 摩科瑞能源集团有限公司（Mercuria Energy Group Ltd）去年的利润略高于 20 亿美元，这是在大宗商品盈利热潮开始消退之际，这家能源交易商取得的又一丰硕成果。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group Ltd made profits of just over $2 billion last year, another bumper result for the energy trader even as a boom in commodities earnings began to fade.】
